name: df-ust
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cust, cmpt(s0, universe, cab(s1, w3a(wss(cv(s1), cpw(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), w3a(wral(s3, cpw(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)))), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cv(s1))), w3a(wss(cres(cid, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s2)), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(ccom(cv(s3), cv(s3)), cv(s2))))))))))
comment: Definition of a uniform structure. Definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.1. A uniform structure is used to give a generalization of the idea of Cauchy's sequence. This definition is analogous to ` TopOn ` . Elements of an uniform structure are called entourages. (Contributed by FL, 29-May-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Nov-2017.)
